code: class  Solution  {   public :   string  lastSubstring ( string  s )  {   int  i  =  0 ;   int  j  =  1 ;   int  k  =  0 ;    while  ( j  +  k  <  s . length ())  {   if  ( s [ i  +  k ]  ==  s [ j  +  k ])  {   ++ k ;   }  else  if  ( s [ i  +  k ]  >  s [ j  +  k ])  {       j  +=  k  +  1 ;   k  =  0 ;   }  else  {       i  =  max ( i  +  k  +  1 ,  j );   j  =  i  +  1 ;   k  =  0 ;   }   }   return  s . substr ( i );   }  };
